J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> Kevin Lawrence wrote:
> 
>>I have an IBM Thinkpad and if I type *assertEquals() very quickly, it
>>beeps. It drives me crazy.
>>
>>Is it just my Thinkpad or have other people experienced this ? Are
>>Thinkpads JUnit aware ?
> 
> 
> IBM is barely JUnit aware, let alone its laptops.

JUnit support within IBM's RAD6 is pretty sweet. JUnit method-level
and scenario-based test generation, as well as test generation
for EJBs, Web Services etc and test suite management capabilities.
I've only played with it for a couple of days but it looks pretty
good so far. Don't know who uses this stuff internally within
IBM but there are obviously customers of IBM who demand this stuff.

Paul.
subject: Re: [junit] [OT] Beeping Asserts
